document.full_text: the bank of japan plans to bolster its capital to provision against potential losses from an asset-buying scheme, a source familiar with the central bank's thinking said, in a move that would give it room to further ease monetary policy if needed to support the economy.
document.title: boj plans capital boost to provision against losses
